column5: I finally got out fishing today. After a Month of Not fishing because of being busy and the past week I was sick and stayed home from school. Tried  forsteel today even tho the condtions were low and and gin clear I finally managed to get one this year. I can't wait ill we get some decent rain and the temps drop. And as for the pic I blurred out the land because I know it bothers some people and don't want to start any negativity in the thread, if you don't like don't post. Thanks
Hey!! Great job!!  I tried for Chrome on Friday...same conditions....and didn't catch anything.  Great looking fish and I didn't know it was photoshopped...thought it was snow....
No photoshop, used paint and does anyone know where I can download a  program somethign similiar to photoshop or atleast jsut to blurr something out. And thanks ccmt
Way to go XR. Nice fish Bud.
good report and congrats on the first
Nice Fish! Good way to start to the chrome season! Congrats
nice one man, great feeling huh
Very nice xr.  I'm hoping for some of that this weekend.  Chris
I feel your pain! But there's rain in the forecast (so they say), and hopefully that'll bring in a few fish. Nice first chromer!
WTG Xrap, doesn't it feel good to get that first one out of the way?!  I broke my ice last sunday with my first two of the season as well, unfortunately, I didn't have my camera.  Again, nice chrome.
congrats dude, nice fish.  bass closes soon, then i can get out for some steel!!

This si my first one of the year, not ever but it is my Pb for sure. Last year got 1 little smalls ones but I never went out much this year I'll be going out a alot more. Thannks for the positive comments guys.
